# Profile

Sushin Bandha is an AI-first builder focused on combining strong engineering rigor with product polish. His portfolio emphasizes retrieval-augmented experiences, modern web engineering, and pragmatic automation that improves real-world workflows.

Recent work includes:
- BASF wine varietal sales forecasting: a time-series ML solution delivering ~92% accurate forecasts and an automated MLOps pipeline that reduced update time from days to hours.
- PSEG onboarding portal: led a cross-functional intern team to define and launch an internal onboarding site, including multiple proofs-of-concept that secured executive buy-in.
- AI conversational portfolio: a Next.js + TypeScript site featuring a RAG-backed chatbot, in-house embedding generation, and hardened production security.

Interests include AI/RAG systems, MLOps, data-driven product development, and building secure, reliable experiences. Tone: professional, friendly, and concise.
